mapper.select: select id, employee_id, name, id_card, phone_num, password, sex, avatar, front_id_card, behind_id_card, holding_id_card, employee_type, sarlary_level, is_delete, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by from employee where id = #{id}

select id, employee_id, name, id_card, phone_num, password, sex, avatar, front_id_card, behind_id_card, holding_id_card, employee_type, sarlary_level, is_delete, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by from employee where phone_num = #{tel}
mapper.insert: insert into employee(employee_id,name, id_card, phone_num, password, sex, avatar, front_id_card, behind_id_card, holding_id_card, employee_type, sarlary_level, is_delete, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by) values (#{employeeId},#{name}, #{idCard}, #{phoneNum}, #{password}, #{sex}, #{avatar}, #{frontIdCard}, #{behindIdCard}, #{holdingIdCard}, #{employeeType}, #{sarlaryLevel}, #{isDelete}, #{createTime}, #{createBy}, #{updateTime}, #{updateBy})

insert into employee(employee_id, name, id_card, phone_num, password, sex, avatar, front_id_card, behind_id_card, holding_id_card, employee_type, sarlary_level, is_delete, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by) values
(#{entity.employeeId}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.idCard}, #{entity.phoneNum}, #{entity.password}, #{entity.sex}, #{entity.avatar}, #{entity.frontIdCard}, #{entity.behindIdCard}, #{entity.holdingIdCard}, #{entity.employeeType}, #{entity.sarlaryLevel}, #{entity.isDelete}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.updateBy})

insert into employee(employee_id, name, id_card, phone_num, password, sex, avatar, front_id_card, behind_id_card, holding_id_card, employee_type, sarlary_level, is_delete, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by) values
(#{entity.employeeId}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.idCard}, #{entity.phoneNum}, #{entity.password}, #{entity.sex}, #{entity.avatar}, #{entity.frontIdCard}, #{entity.behindIdCard}, #{entity.holdingIdCard}, #{entity.employeeType}, #{entity.sarlaryLevel}, #{entity.isDelete}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.updateBy})
on duplicate key update employee_id = values(employee_id), name = values(name), id_card = values(id_card), phone_num = values(phone_num), password = values(password), sex = values(sex), avatar = values(avatar), front_id_card = values(front_id_card), behind_id_card = values(behind_id_card), holding_id_card = values(holding_id_card), employee_type = values(employee_type), sarlary_level = values(sarlary_level), is_delete = values(is_delete), create_time = values(create_time), create_by = values(create_by), update_time = values(update_time), update_by = values(update_by)
mapper.update:
update employee
employee_id = #{employeeId},
name = #{name},
id_card = #{idCard},
phone_num = #{phoneNum},
password = #{password},
sex = #{sex},
avatar = #{avatar},
front_id_card = #{frontIdCard},
behind_id_card = #{behindIdCard},
holding_id_card = #{holdingIdCard},
employee_type = #{employeeType},
sarlary_level = #{sarlaryLevel},
is_delete = #{isDelete},
create_time = #{createTime},
create_by = #{createBy},
update_time = #{updateTime},
update_by = #{updateBy},
where id = #{id}
update employee set employee_type = #{type} where phone_num = #{tel}
